name: Pong Battle Royale (TetraStudios)
description:
Who will be the last team standing? Pong Battle Royale is a frantic, intense LAN-based party game best enjoyed with as many friends as possible!

Compete to be the last person or team standing in Battle Royale, or fight your way alone or with a group to get the most eliminations in the Skirmish mode across 4 different maps! Master the battlefield with devastating power ups to destroy the competition!

NOTE: LAN-based multiplayer only - Make sure everyone is on the same WIFI network. If PBR does not launch, right click on the exe file -> Properties -> Tick the Unblock box -> Apply.
